function.name: DBA_FIX_CHANGEINCHARSET
function.body: /************************************************************************* * The contents of this file are subject to the Openbravo Public License * Version 1.0 (the "License"), being the Mozilla Public License * Version 1.1 with a permitted attribution clause; you may not use this * file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of * the License at http://www.openbravo.com/legal/license.html * Software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" * basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the * License for the specific language governing rights and limitations * under the License. * The Original Code is Openbravo ERP. * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Openbravo SL * All portions are Copyright (C) 2001-2006 Openbravo SL * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): ______________________________________. ************************************************************************/ BEGIN UPDATE AD_ELEMENT_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_FIELDGROUP_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME) ; UPDATE AD_FIELD_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_FORM_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_MENU_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION) ; UPDATE AD_MESSAGE_TRL SET MSGTEXT=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(MSGTEXT), MSGTIP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(MSGTIP) ; UPDATE AD_PROCESS_PARA_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_PROCESS_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_REFERENCE_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_REF_LIST_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION) ; UPDATE AD_TAB_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_TASK_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_TEXTINTERFACES_TRL SET TEXT=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(TEXT) ; UPDATE AD_WF_NODE_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_WINDOW_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; UPDATE AD_WORKFLOW_TRL SET NAME=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(NAME), DESCRIPTION=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(DESCRIPTION), HELP=DBA_REPLACE_CHANGEDCHARSET(HELP) ; END DBA_FIX_CHANGEINCHARSET
